title: Senator tells Pence failed virus testing is ‘dereliction’ - USA TODAY
description: Senator tells Pence failed virus testing is ‘dereliction’ USA TODAY Democrats confront Pence: 'I have never been so mad about a phone call in my life' CNN 'I have never been so mad about a phone call in my life' POLITICO Karen Pence on individuals struggling …
content:
WASHINGTON Frustration boiled over into anger Friday on a private call with Vice President Mike Pence as Democratic senators questioned administration officials about coronavirus testing plans but left without adequate answers.
